de.muspellheim.commons.util

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.muspellheim.commons.util.Configuration

  • public class Configuration
extends Object
    Uses properties files and system properties as configuration.

    A system property override a property from file. A default configuration can be load from class path.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Configuration()
      Create an empty configuration.
      Configuration(@NonNull Properties properties)
      Initialize a configuration.

    • Method Summary

      Get a value from configuration or default value if key not exists.

    • Method Detail

      • loadDefaults

        public void loadDefaults(@NonNull
                         @NonNull String basename)
                  throws ConfigurationException
        Load default configuration from class path.

        Load a properties file from class path /{basename}.properties.

        Parameters:
        basename - basename of properties file.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if default configuration can not be loaded.

      • load

        public void load(@NonNull
                 @NonNull String basename)
          throws ConfigurationException
        Load configuration from working directory.

        Load a properties file from working directory {basename}.properties.

        Parameters:
        basename - basename of properties file.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if configuration can not be loaded.

      • load

        public void load(@NonNull
                 @NonNull Path propertiesFile)
          throws ConfigurationException
        Load configuration from any path.
        Parameters:
        propertiesFile - path to a properties file.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if configuration can not be loaded.

        public String getString(String key)

        Returns:
        the value.
        Throws:

        NotConfiguredException - if key not exists in configuration.
